article_title: IRS Issues Bigger Tax Refunds, Sees Spikes In Use Of 'Where's My Refund?' Tool

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: So far, so good for federal taxpayers looking for a refund this season. IRS is reporting that they are issuing checks faster than last year - and those checks are bigger. IRS also notes that use of their website, including the "Where's My Refund?" tool is up over the same time last year.
